The prayer of the Official Assignee is to the

following effect :-

(a) 

The 
Official

permitted 

to

the 
estate

in

of

Inderpal 

& 

Co.,

(Personal) 

in 

order

and

Inderpal 
& 

Co., 

on

.

There is no reason why the prayer should not be

granted. The Report is made absolute in terms of prayer

clause (a).
